title: Top 4 benefits of customized, closed-loop and end-of-life recycling programs for automakers - PR Newswire
summary: Novelis, the largest recycler of aluminum in the world, partners with automakers to create customized circular economy programs that involve closed-loop and end-of-life recycling solutions. These programs help automakers reduce carbon emissions and waste, preserve natural resources, and enhance economic benefits.
green_innovation: TRUE, because the described recycling program contributes to environmental sustainability goals by reducing waste and preserving natural resources.
business_innovation: TRUE, because the described recycling program is a new or improved business process that differs significantly from the firm's previous business processes and that has been brought into use in the firm.
green_product: TRUE, because the described recycling program involves the use of environmentally benign materials and processes that minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability.
green_process: TRUE, because the described recycling program is a method or technique that minimizes environmental impacts and promotes sustainability.

title: Battle for the Box - Tech Briefs
summary: The automotive industry is rapidly transitioning to electric vehicles (EVs), and with that comes a need for new and innovative battery pack designs. This article discusses the various materials and manufacturing processes that are being used to develop lighter, more efficient, and more affordable battery packs. It also highlights the challenges that engineers face in designing battery packs that meet the safety and performance requirements of EVs.
